result.title: Memory Limit Exceeded!
result.content: I am trying to solve this problem 937D - Сонная игра. I'm doing a dfs and calculating the nodes that can be reached from the starting node s. If the graph does'nt have any sink-nodes (nodes from which you can't move out or nodes with no out-edge), the game will be a draw. Now, if there are any sink-nodes that have odd path length from the starting node Petya can win. For now I haven't considered the problem of a cycle when there are multiple paths between two nodes and Petya can chose which path to follow for winning. I believe I'm using memory of the O(7*n) as n ~ 2*m for the question, n is no of vertices and m is no of edges. I believe this should not exceed the memory limit of 256 MB. Problem link : 937D - Сонная игра My solution : 35780913 I can't figure out the reason to why this happens!
